snippet.title: Castlevania [XBOX 360, PS3 - Cancelled]
snippet.description:
Produced by Koji Igarashi, this new Castlevania game was briefly shown at TGS 2008 with a teaser where Alucard was the protagonist.

That was the first and last time the game was discussed and since then it seems it was quietly cancelled in favor of MercurySteam's Lord of Shadow project.
